description.ko: 미래지향적 캐릭터 디자인과 추상적 기하학의 강렬한 융합으로, 산산조각 난 디지털 레이어와 선명한 데이터 간섭을 통해 재해석된 KURO-X의 모습입니다.
description.en: A striking fusion of futuristic character design and abstract geometry, where KURO-X is reimagined through shattered digital layers and vibrant data interference.

prompt: KURO-X in a geometric glitch art style, sharp fragmented shapes, digital distortion effects, neon cyan and magenta highlights, abstract polygonal composition, high-tech cyberpunk aesthetic, 8k resolution, clean lines with data corruption artifacts, cinematic lighting.
